title: Pururun! Shizuku-chan
synopsis: The series revolves around a playful young child named Shizuku-Chan. He, alongside his schoolmates, friends, and family lives a life of dangerous adventures in the Shizuku Forest.
voices: ['Ishii, Makoto', 'Yuzuki, Ryouka', 'Narita, Sayaka', 'Yasumura, Makoto', 'Kawazu, Yasuhiko', 'Itou, Miyako']
staff: [['Sister MAYO', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Masuda, Toshihiko', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Kameyama, Koichiro', ['Music']]]
